title: UAE Ministry of Education announces Friday remote learning during Ramadan
summary_full: UAE schools are embracing a unique approach this Ramadan, with public school students studying from home every Friday. This "Ramadan with Family" initiative, now in its second year, aims to foster family bonds while ensuring academic continuity.  While students learn remotely, on-site staff remain, and parents can opt for in-person attendance with their own transport arrangements.
